LanguageData.SPBD_CosmosTailorBench.label: cosmos tailoring workbench
LanguageData.SPBD_CosmosTailorBench.description: A Sheepawn's tailoring workbench. It comes with a small foot-pedal sewing machine.
LanguageData.SPBD_CosmosElectronicTailorBench.label: cosmos electric tailoring workbench
LanguageData.SPBD_CosmosElectronicTailorBench.descrip: A Sheepawn's electric tailoring workbench. Naturally, it comes with a small electric sewing machine.
LanguageData.SPBD_CosmosOrionWeavingMachine.label: cosmos orion loom
LanguageData.SPBD_CosmosOrionWeavingMachine.descripti: A loom that synthesizes orion from aries, the wool from Sheepawns, and plasteel. Unlike other workbenches, the production of orion requires extremely delicate work, so only a select group of technicians will actually be able to use it.
